claimRewards().details: Manually claim rewards from rewardDistributor by keeper

migrate(address).details: _beforeMigration hook can be implemented in child strategy to do extra steps.

migrateFusePool(uint256).details: Redeems cTokens from current fuse pool and mints cTokens of new Fuse Pool

rebalance().details: Rebalance profit, loss and investment of this strategy

sweepERC20(address).details: sweep given token to feeCollector of strategy

totalValue().details: Report total value in collateral token

totalValueCurrent().details: Report total value in collateral token

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraw collateral token from lending pool.

devdoc.title: This strategy will deposit collateral token in a Rari Fuse Pool and earn interest.

addKeeper(address).notice: Add given address in keepers list.

claimRewards().notice: Properly tests if reward claim works

isReservedToken(address).notice: Check whether given token is reserved or not. Reserved tokens are not allowed to sweep.

migrate(address).notice: Migrate all asset and vault ownership,if any, to new strategy

migrateFusePool(uint256).notice: Changes the underlying Fuse Pool to a new one

removeKeeper(address).notice: Remove given address from keepers list.

token().notice: Returns address of token correspond to collateral token

totalValue().notice: Calculate total value using underlying token

totalValueCurrent().notice: Calculate total value of asset under management (in real-time)
